Method Detail

attachRoom

public void attachRoom(int origin,
                       java.lang.String direction,
                       int destination)
Attach a room to another Room, creating a door to link those two. The currentRoom will create on given direction, and newRoom will create on opposite direction, so the doors are "connected"

Parameters:
origin - id from origin room
direction - which side should be used to create a door
destination - The id of the room you will reach.

Parameters:
id - id of the room
direction - direction of the room
description - description of the object
Returns:
id id of the item created
